content: I agree with your approach. I have a similar approach but I use another category; a ‘view’. So I do split my components in three folders: ui (Individual components to be reused on the application. They only depend from props, for example a TodoForm, TodoItem, TodoList).views (Group of ‘ui’ components, for example a TodosView)containers (Components decorated with Redux connect, often a route component who renders a ‘view’, for example a TodosContainer). What do you think on this on this approach?
